titleInfo.title: Letter, J.G.M. Ramsey and M.B.C. Ramsey in Charlotte, N.C., to Mrs. E.A.R. Breck in Liberty, Va. 1867 undated

mods.abstract: 1867 Letters from J.G.M. Ramsey and wife, M.B.C. Ramsey, Charlotte, N.C., to their daughter, E.A.R. Breck in Liberty, Virginia. J.G.M. briefly mentions a long letter from son Crozier. Expresses details of family's prosperity and abundance of livestock/poultry and fresh fruits/vegetables. His wife expresses details of Sophie Alexander's wedding. Gives details of her own plans for traveling via buggy, and condition of her health.

name.namePart: Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready)
